basicAttack.name: Half Truths
basicAttack.basicAttack: Aalto fires up to 5 consecutive shots, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack 4 will spread the "Mist" forward, which lasts for 1.5s.
basicAttack.heavyAttack: Aalto enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Aero DMG.
basicAttack.midairAttack: Aalto consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.
basicAttack.dodgeCounter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Mist Avatar
skills.description: Casts "Mist" and 1 "Mist Avatar(s)" to taunt the surrounding targets. The avatars inherit a portion of Aalto's HP and generate 6 Mist Bullets around them, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Mist Bullets
skills.description: Deals Aero DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.
Generate a "Gate of Quandary" in front, dealing Aero DMG. When bullets pass trough the "Gate of Quandary", they deal increased DMG. "Gate of Quandary" lasts for 10s.
When Aalto passes through "Mist" or "Gate of Quandary", he enters Mistcloak Dash.

skills.name: Mistcloak Dash
skills.description: Movement speed increased; During this period, "Mist Drops" are continuously consumed, and for each 1 "Mist Drop" consumed, 1 Mist Bullet(s) is generated.

skills.name: Mist Drops
skills.description: Aalto can hold up to 6 "Mist Drops". When Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through "Mist" and hits the target, 1 "Mist Drop" is recovered.

skills.name: Perfect Performance
skills.description: Aalto's Heavy Attack will always critically hit, triggered once every 30s.

skills.name: Mid-game Break
skills.description: Aalto will continuously recover Stamina when he is in the Forte Circuit Mistcloak Dash state.

skills.name: Feint Shot
skills.description: Aalto shows up out of thin air to perform rapid continuous shooting, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Dissolving Mist
skills.description: The incoming Resonator has their Aero DMG Amplified by 23% for 14s or until they are switched out.
